alert.note: Alert for Southeastern Mendocino Interior; Southwestern Mendocino Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 21 at 2:14PM PST until February 24 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THURSDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THURSDAY TO 10 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 8 inches Thursday afternoon through Friday morning. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Snow accumulations of up to 3 inches through Thursday afternoon. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Southwestern Mendocino Interior and Southeastern Mendocino Interior Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 4 PM Thursday to 10 AM PST Friday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 4 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.

area.areaDesc: Southeastern Mendocino Interior; Southwestern Mendocino Interior
